place.name: TIR IFAN
place.gazetteerText: TIR-EVAN, a township in Yspytty parish, Denbigh; 8½ miles SSE of Llanrwst. Acres, 3,954. Real property, £919. Pop., 352. Houses, 80 An hospital of the Knights of St. John was here. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
